AgenticLabeling.summary: AI-powered automatic labeling platform with microservices architecture

frontend.description: Streamlit 기반 라벨 검증 UI, Label Studio Lite 통합

backend.description: 마이크로서비스 아키텍처 - Gateway가 Detection, Segmentation, Classification Agent를 오케스트레이션

architecture.code:
graph TD
    GW[Gateway :8000] --> DA[Detection Agent :8001]
    GW --> SA[Segmentation Agent :8002]
    GW --> CA[Classification Agent :8003]
    GW --> TA[Training Agent :8005]
    DA --> OR[(Object Registry :8010)]
    SA --> OR
    CA --> OR
    OR --> |SQLite| DB[(Metadata)]
    OR --> |ChromaDB| VDB[(Vectors)]

cc-initializer.summary: Claude Code configuration framework for AI-assisted development workflows

backend.description: Skills, Agents, Hooks, Commands를 통한 개발 워크플로우 자동화

architecture.code:
graph TD
    SK[Skills 22개] --> SET[settings.json]
    AG[Agents 20개] --> SET
    HK[Hooks 5개] --> SET
    CMD[Commands 6개] --> SET
    SET --> DOCS[docs/ standards]
    DOCS --> PRD[PRD.md]
    DOCS --> TECH[TECH-SPEC.md]
    DOCS --> PROG[PROGRESS.md]

DXTnavis.summary: Navisworks 2025 BIM Property Viewer & AWP 4D Automation Plugin

frontend.description: Navisworks 플러그인 UI - Property Viewer, TimeLiner 자동화 패널

backend.description: CSV 데이터를 TimeLiner 4D 시뮬레이션으로 변환하는 파이프라인

architecture.code:
graph LR
    CSV[CSV Data] --> Parser[CSV Parser]
    Parser --> Mapper[Property Mapper]
    Mapper --> TL[TimeLiner API]
    TL --> SIM[4D Simulation]
    NW[Navisworks Model] --> Props[Property Viewer]
    Props --> Export[Export Module]

AgenticREVIT.summary: Agentic Ontology System for Autodesk REVIT v2025 using LangGraph

backend.description: LangGraph 기반 에이전트가 REVIT 모델을 분석하고 자동화 태스크 수행

architecture.code:
graph TD
    UI[REVIT Add-in] --> API[Revit API]
    API --> Agent[LangGraph Agent]
    Agent --> Ontology[BIM Ontology]
    Agent --> LLM[OpenAI LLM]
    Ontology --> Tasks[Automation Tasks]
    Tasks --> API

algo-quant.summary: Quantitative investment automation with Fama-French multi-factor models

frontend.description: Dash 대시보드 - Live Analyzer, Factor Analysis, Backtest 결과 시각화

backend.description: 데이터 수집 → 팩터 분석 → 레짐 분류 → 백테스트 파이프라인

architecture.code:
graph TD
    DATA[Data Collection] --> |yfinance| PRICE[Price Data]
    DATA --> |Kenneth French| FACTOR[Factor Data]
    PRICE --> FA[Factor Analysis]
    FACTOR --> FA
    FA --> |FF3/FF5| REGIME[Regime Classification]
    REGIME --> |HMM| STRATEGY[Strategy Engine]
    STRATEGY --> BT[Backtest Engine]
    BT --> METRICS[Performance Metrics]

palantir-stock.summary: Web search based company information collection and stock analysis agent

frontend.description: CLI 기반, 웹 대시보드 계획 중

backend.description: Graph RAG + Vector RAG 하이브리드 검색, 기업 지식 그래프 구축

architecture.code:
graph TD
    QUERY[User Query] --> ORCH[LangGraph Orchestrator]
    ORCH --> SEARCH[Search Agent]
    ORCH --> ANALYSIS[Analysis Agent]
    ORCH --> STOCK[Stock Agent]
    SEARCH --> VDB[(ChromaDB)]
    ANALYSIS --> GDB[(Neo4j)]
    STOCK --> |yfinance| MARKET[Market Data]
    VDB --> HYBRID[Hybrid Retrieval]
    GDB --> HYBRID
    HYBRID --> LLM[LLM Response]

med-vision.summary: Medical image AI research project using AgenticLabeling microservices

backend.description: AgenticLabeling 시스템과 통합하여 의료 영상 자동 라벨링 및 모델 학습

architecture.code:
graph TD
    RAW[Medical Images] --> GW[AgenticLabeling Gateway]
    GW --> DET[Florence-2 Detection]
    GW --> SEG[SAM2 Segmentation]
    DET --> REG[(Object Registry)]
    SEG --> REG
    REG --> EXPORT[Dataset Export]
    EXPORT --> TRAIN[YOLO Training]
    TRAIN --> MLFLOW[MLflow Tracking]

binance-algo-trading.summary: Binance algorithmic trading system with backtesting and automated execution

frontend.description: 실시간 트레이딩 대시보드, 백테스트 결과 시각화, 전략 관리 UI

backend.description: Python 전략 엔진 + Rust 초저지연 실행 엔진, Telegram 알림 통합

architecture.code:
graph TD
    UI[Next.js Dashboard] --> API[FastAPI Server :8000]
    API --> STRAT[Strategy Engine]
    API --> BT[Backtest Engine]
    STRAT --> EXEC[Rust Execution Engine]
    EXEC --> |WebSocket| BINANCE[Binance API]
    STRAT --> DB[(PostgreSQL + TimescaleDB)]
    API --> CACHE[(Redis)]
    API --> TG[Telegram Bot]

student-manager.summary: Academy class management system with drag-and-drop schedule board

frontend.description: 시간표 매트릭스 보드, 드래그 앤 드롭 수업 이동, 실시간 상태 추적

architecture.code:
graph TD
    UI[React App] --> ZUSTAND[Zustand Store]
    ZUSTAND --> FB[(Firebase)]
    UI --> DND[@dnd-kit]
    DND --> BOARD[Schedule Board]
    BOARD --> |Subject x Time| MATRIX[Matrix View]
    FB --> SYNC[Real-time Sync]

n8n-automation.summary: n8n AI Automation Portfolio - Interactive workflow visualization with React Flow

projects.name: Stock Tracking System
projects.description: 멀티 소스 수집 + AI 인사이트 + 텔레그램 알림

projects.name: Media Automation
projects.description: 리서치 → 콘텐츠 생성 → 멀티 플랫폼 배포

highlights: Real-time workflow parsing from n8n JSON
Custom node types: Trigger, AI, Code, Logic, HTTP, Integration

physical-unity.summary: Unity Physics Simulation & Game Development Portfolio
